about_the_game:
Welcome to Loftia, a cozy, multiplayer world where you can build towards a brighter, more sustainable future! Connect with friends both old and new, to farm, craft, explore, decorate, and create a meaningful impact - together.

In the world of Loftia, you can:

Make a difference 🌱

Work together with others to build a brighter and more sustainable world, by contributing to community projects. Unlock new resources, uncover hidden stories, and discover exciting new islands.

Share a neighborhood 🏠

Customize your own personal floating island and join up with others to form neighborhoods. Decorate, farm, craft and party together!

Adventure together on group quests 🪁

From scavenging in deserted factories to venturing through sky islands, you can work together with friends to tackle group content, and solve challenging puzzles across new biomes.

Turn trash into treasure ♻️

Repurpose discarded materials into valued equipment through an innovative new crafting system, whether it’s upcycling an old tire into a flower planter or crafting unique furniture from reclaimed wood!

Discover new-age farming 🌾

Master sustainable farming techniques like hydroponics, aquaponics, and trellis farming. Craft your own tools using renewable energy generated from the sun, wind and rain!

Customize your world ✨

Create a character that reflects your own personal style and design your home in your favorite aesthetic—whether it’s Y2K, Goth, or something uniquely yours. Add a personal touch by crafting organic paints and dyes to color your items just the way you like!

Adopt a cute companion 🐶

Rescue and adopt animals to join you on your journey—from capybaras and turtles, to endangered species and more. You’ll even be able to dress them up in cute outfits!

Just chill with friends! 💛

Whether you’re exploring, building, or simply unwinding with friends, Loftia offers countless opportunities for fun, creativity, and meaningful connections for everyone.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Apple M1 GPU or Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro / M1 Max
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro / M1 Max GPU, or AMD Radeon Pro 5500M or better (if Intel-based)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
